00043 #ifndef __OPENCV_VIDEOSTAB_FRAME_SOURCE_HPP__
00044 #define __OPENCV_VIDEOSTAB_FRAME_SOURCE_HPP__
00045 
00046 #include <vector>
00047 #include <string>
00048 #include "opencv2/core/core.hpp"
00049 #include "opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp"
00050 
00051 namespace cv
00052 {
00053 namespace videostab
00054 {
00055 
00056 class CV_EXPORTS IFrameSource
00057 {
00058 public:
00059     virtual ~IFrameSource() {}
00060     virtual void reset() = 0;
00061     virtual Mat nextFrame() = 0;
00062 };
00063 
00064 class CV_EXPORTS NullFrameSource : public IFrameSource
00065 {
00066 public:
00067     virtual void reset() {}
00068     virtual Mat nextFrame() { return Mat(); }
00069 };
00070 
00071 class CV_EXPORTS VideoFileSource : public IFrameSource
00072 {
00073 public:
00074     VideoFileSource(const std::string &path, bool volatileFrame = false);
00075 
00076     virtual void reset();
00077     virtual Mat nextFrame();
00078 
00079     int frameCount() { return static_cast<int>(reader_.get(CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_COUNT)); }
00080     double fps() { return reader_.get(CV_CAP_PROP_FPS); }
00081 
00082 private:
00083     std::string path_;
00084     bool volatileFrame_;
00085     VideoCapture reader_;
00086 };
00087 
00088 } // namespace videostab
00089 } // namespace cv
00090 
00091 #endif
